metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: large aperture scintillometer of Daman Superstation, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：大满超级站大孔径闪烁仪（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the large aperture scintillometer (LAS) at Daman Superstation in the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2022. There were two types of LASs at Daman Superstation: BLS900 and RR-RSS460, produced by Germany. The north tower was set up with the BLS900 receiver and the RR-RSS460 transmitter, and the south tower was equipped with the BLS900 transmitter and the RR-RSS460 receiver. The site (north: 100.379° E, 38.861° N; south: 100.369° E, 38.847° N) was located in Daman irrigation district, which is near Zhangye, Gansu Province. The underlying surfaces between the two towers were corn, orchard, and greenhouse. The elevation is 1556 m. The effective height of the LASs was 24.1 m, and the path length was 1854 m. The data were sampled 1 minute at both BLS900 and RR-RSS460.
The raw data acquired at 1 min intervals were processed and quality controlled. The data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods, in which sensible heat flux was iteratively calculated by combining Cn2 with meteorological data according to the Monin-Obukhov similarity theory. The main quality control steps were as follows: (1) The data were rejected when Cn2 exceeded the saturated criterion (BLS900：Cn2>7.25E-14，RR-RSS460：Cn2>7.84 E-14). (2) The data were rejected when the demodulation signal was small (BLS900：Average X Intensity<1000；RR-RSS460：Demod>-20mv). (3) The data were rejected when collected during precipitation. (4) The data were rejected if collected at night when weak turbulence occurred (u* was less than 0.1 m/s). In the iteration process, the universal functions of Thiermann and Grassl (1992) and Andreas (1988) were selected for BLS900 and RR-RSS460, respectively. Detailed can refer to Liu et al. (2011, 2013). Due to instrument adjustment and inadequate power supply, the date of missing data for the large aperture scintillator is:2022.02.17-2022.02.22;2022.07.14-2022.07.26;2022.08.02-2022.08.04.
Several instructions were included with the released data. (1) The data were primarily obtained from BLS900 measurements, and missing flux measurements from the BLS900 instrument were substituted with measurements from the RR-RSS460 instrument. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) The dataset contained the following variables: Date/time (yyyy/m/d h:mm), the structural parameter of the air refractive index (Cn2, m-2/3), and the sensible heat flux (H, W/m^2). In this dataset, a time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30, and the data were stored in *.xlsx format. 
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) (for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游大满站的大孔径闪烁仪通量观测数据。中游大满站分别架设了BLS900和RR-RSS460型号的大孔径闪烁仪，北塔为BLS900的接收端和RR-RSS460的发射端，南塔为BLS900的发射端和RR-RSS460的接收端。观测时间为2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日。站点位于甘肃省张掖市大满灌区内，下垫面是玉米、果园和大棚，以玉米为主。北塔的经纬度是100.3785E，38.8607N，南塔的经纬度是100.3685E，38.8468N，海拔高度约1556m。大孔径闪烁仪的有效高度24.1m，光径长度是1854m，采样频率是1min。
大孔径闪烁仪原始观测数据为1min，发布的数据为经过处理与质量控制后的数据，其中感热通量主要是结合自动气象站观测数据，基于莫宁-奥布霍夫相似理论通过迭代计算得到，主要的质量控制步骤包括：（1）剔除Cn2达到饱和的数据（BLS900：Cn2>7.25E-14，RR-RSS460：Cn2>7.84 E-14）；（2）剔除解调信号强度较弱的数据（BLS900：Average X Intensity<1000；RR-RSS460：Demod>-20mv）；（3）剔除降水时刻的数据；（4）剔除稳定条件下的弱湍流的数据（u*小于0.1m/s）。在迭代计算过程中，对于BLS900，选取Thiermann and Grassl(1992)的稳定度普适函数；对于RR-RSS460，选取Andreas(1988)的稳定度普适函数，详细介绍请参考Liu et al. (2011, 2013)。由于仪器维修、供电不足和信号问题，大孔径闪烁仪数据缺失的日期为：2022.02.17-2022.02.22；2022.07.14-2022.07.26；2022.08.02-2022.08.04。
关于发布数据的几点说明：（1）中游LAS数据以BLS900为主，缺失时刻由RR-RSS460观测补充，两者都缺失则以-6999标记。（2）数据表头：Date/Time ：日期/时间（格式：yyyy/m/d h:mm），Cn2 ：空气折射指数结构参数（单位：m-2/3），H：感热通量（单位：W/m2）。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xlsx格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，尤其是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域已被先前研究者发现为碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展具有重要意义。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们展示了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，涵盖了2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时还包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了共11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the use of large aperture scintillometers in data collection involve quality control steps to remove weak demodulation signal intensities?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在数据收集过程中，使用大孔径闪烁计是否涉及质量控制步骤，以去除弱解调信号强度？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are long-term observations considered indispensable for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Verification.QuestionCn: 长期观测是否被认为是理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换所必不可少的？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the primary data collection methods for oasis-desert interactions based on field observations, remote sensing, or numerical simulations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 关于绿洲-沙漠相互作用的主要数据收集方法是基于实地观察、遥感还是数值模拟？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: field observations, remote sensing, numerical simulations
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 现场观测、遥感、数值模拟

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: What is the main challenge in collecting data in inland river basins: ecological degradation, data quality control, or technological limitations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在内陆河流流域收集数据的主要挑战是什么：生态退化、数据质量控制还是技术限制？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the primary challenges in data collection for oasis–desert ecosystems in arid and semiarid regions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，收集绿洲-沙漠生态系统数据的主要挑战是什么？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to monitor energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于监测绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method is the use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data, supplemented with hydrometeorological data from automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period.
Example.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法的一个例子是使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据，并辅以来自自动气象站的水文气象数据，后者的平均周期为10分钟。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when maintaining long-term observational datasets in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域中，维护长期观测数据集时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge is the ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, particularly in regions like the Tarim River basin and Aral Sea basin.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是生态环境的恶化，例如河流和湖泊的干涸、自然植被的退化、土地沙漠化的加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，特别是在塔里木河流域和咸海流域等地区。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific data quality control procedures applied to scintillometer data in arid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，对闪烁仪数据应用的具体数据质量控制程序是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: removing data where the structure parameter of the refractive index (Cn2) reaches saturation, eliminating data with weak demodulated signal intensity, excluding data during precipitation, removing data under stable conditions with weak turbulence
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 去除结构参数达到饱和的折射率数据（Cn2），剔除解调信号强度弱的数据，排除降水期间的数据，去除在稳定条件下湍流弱的数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed for measuring the turbulent fluxes in the middle and lower reaches of arid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区的中下游测量湍流通量采用了哪些方法？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: eddy covariance system, scintillometer, hydrometeorological observations, vegetation parameters, soil parameters
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统，闪烁仪，水文气象观测，植被参数，土壤参数

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many superstations have been established for data collection in the middle and lower reaches of the HRB since 2012?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，在HRB的中下游地区建立了多少个超级站用于数据收集？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the sampling frequency used for collecting turbulent flux data in the observational datasets from oasis–desert systems?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集中，收集湍流通量数据所使用的采样频率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many ordinary stations are part of the land surface flux and meteorological stations network in the HRB since 2012?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，HRB地区的陆面通量和气象站网络中有多少个普通站？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is a large aperture scintillometer and how is it used in data collection for surface process observations in arid regions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪是什么，它如何用于干旱地区地表过程观测的数据收集？
Definition.AnswerEn: A large aperture scintillometer is an instrument used to measure the heat flux between the surface and the atmosphere. It is employed in data collection for surface process observations by setting up two towers, one with a transmitter and the other with a receiver, to measure the refractive index structure parameter of air over a certain path length. This helps in assessing energy exchanges, particularly sensible heat flux, in regions like the Heihe River Basin.
Definition.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪是一种用于测量地表与大气之间热通量的仪器。它通过设置两座塔，一座装有发射器，另一座装有接收器，来测量一定路径长度上空气的折射率结构参数，从而用于表面过程观测的数据收集。这有助于评估能量交换，特别是在像黑河流域这样的地区的显热通量。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data quality control steps for large aperture scintillometer flux data compare with those for eddy covariance system data in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪通量数据的数据质量控制步骤与涡度协方差系统数据在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的数据质量控制步骤有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data quality control steps for large aperture scintillometer flux data involve removing saturated data, weak signal intensity data, precipitation periods, and weak turbulence under stable conditions. In contrast, eddy covariance system data typically require corrections for coordinate rotation, frequency response, and density fluctuations, along with similar filtering for precipitation and poor turbulence conditions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪通量数据的数据质量控制步骤包括去除饱和数据、弱信号强度数据、降水期间以及在稳定条件下的弱湍流。相比之下，涡度协方差系统数据通常需要进行坐标旋转、频率响应和密度波动的修正，以及类似的降水和较差湍流条件的过滤。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in data collection methods between the large aperture scintillometer and automatic weather stations used in the middle reaches of the Heihe River Basin?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站在黑河流域中游的资料收集方法之间有哪些相似之处和不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both the large aperture scintillometer and automatic weather stations collect data at high temporal resolution, with the scintillometer sampling at 1-minute intervals and weather stations often averaging over 10 minutes. The primary difference is that the scintillometer focuses on flux measurements like sensible heat, while weather stations collect a broader range of hydrometeorological data including temperature, humidity, and soil parameters.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站以高时间分辨率收集数据，闪烁仪以1分钟的间隔采样，而气象站通常以10分钟为单位进行平均。主要区别在于，闪烁仪专注于通量测量，如显热，而气象站则收集更广泛的水文气象数据，包括温度、湿度和土壤参数。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the challenges of data collection in oasis-desert systems in the Heihe River Basin compare with those in other inland river basins like the Tarim or Aral Sea basins?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在河西走廊的绿洲-沙漠系统中，数据收集的挑战与其他内陆河流流域如塔里木河流域或阿拉尔海流域相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Challenges in the Heihe River Basin include equipment maintenance, power supply issues, and signal problems, leading to data gaps. In comparison, other basins like the Tarim or Aral Sea face ecological degradation challenges such as drying rivers, vegetation loss, and desertification, which may impact the reliability and consistency of long-term data collection efforts.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 黑河流域面临的挑战包括设备维护、电力供应问题和信号问题，导致数据缺口。相比之下，塔里木河或咸海等其他流域面临生态退化的挑战，如河流干涸、植被丧失和沙漠化，这可能影响长期数据收集工作的可靠性和一致性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What data collection methods might be employed to ensure the accuracy and reliability of flux measurements in arid and semi-arid regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，确保通量测量的准确性和可靠性可以采用哪些数据收集方法？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Data collection methods such as using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers, along with automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data, are employed to ensure the accuracy of flux measurements. Quality control procedures include removing data affected by saturation, weak signal intensities, precipitation, and weak turbulence, as well as using stability functions for data processing.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法如使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪，以及自动气象站收集水文气象数据，旨在确保通量测量的准确性。质量控制程序包括去除受饱和、信号强度弱、降水和湍流弱影响的数据，以及在数据处理过程中使用稳定性函数。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges and solutions in maintaining long-term observation datasets in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在维持绿洲-沙漠生态系统的长期观察数据集时，可能面临的挑战和解决方案是什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Potential challenges in maintaining long-term observation datasets include ecological degradation like drying up of rivers, intensification of land desertification, and dust storms. Solutions involve implementing rigorous data quality control and processing procedures, setting up multiple observation stations, and supplementing datasets with auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 维护长期观测数据集的潜在挑战包括生态退化，如河流干涸、土地沙漠化加剧和沙尘暴。解决方案包括实施严格的数据质量控制和处理程序，建立多个观测站，并通过补充水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据来丰富数据集。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of different observational instruments improve the understanding of energy and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同观测仪器的整合如何提高对绿洲-沙漠地区能量和碳交换的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of different observational instruments, such as eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, and automatic weather stations, allows for comprehensive data collection on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange. This approach provides a quantitative understanding of oasis–desert interactions, crucial for ecological stability and socioeconomic development, by offering diverse data types for analysis.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 不同观测仪器的集成，如涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪和自动气象站，使得对能量、水汽和碳交换的全面数据收集成为可能。这种方法通过提供多样的数据类型进行分析，为绿洲-沙漠相互作用的定量理解提供了支持，这对生态稳定和社会经济发展至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the need for rigorous quality control in data collected from large aperture scintillometers?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致对大孔径闪烁仪收集的数据进行严格质量控制的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Quality control is necessary due to factors such as saturation of the refractive index structure parameter (Cn2), weak demodulated signal intensity, precipitation events, and weak turbulence under stable conditions. These issues can lead to inaccurate data, necessitating a thorough quality control process.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 质量控制是必要的，原因包括折射率结构参数（Cn2）的饱和、弱解调信号强度、降水事件以及在稳定条件下的弱湍流。这些问题可能导致数据不准确，因此需要进行彻底的质量控制过程。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why are long-term observations crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么长期观测对于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换至关重要？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Long-term observations are essential to quantitatively understand the interactions between oasis and desert systems, which is important for maintaining ecological stability and socioeconomic development. They help achieve goals like carbon peaking and neutrality by providing insights into the basic characteristics of these exchanges.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 长期观察对于定量理解绿洲与沙漠系统之间的相互作用至关重要，这对维持生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义。它们通过提供对这些交换基本特征的洞察，帮助实现碳达峰和碳中和等目标。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges faced by inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临的挑战的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges in inland river basins arise due to ecological environment degradation, including drying rivers and lakes, natural vegetation degradation, intensified desertification, and frequent dust storms, particularly in areas westward along the Silk Road.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域面临的挑战源于生态环境退化，包括河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，特别是在丝绸之路沿线的西部地区。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects of data gaps due to instrument maintenance or signal issues on the long-term monitoring of ecological and climatic trends in the Heihe River Basin?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 由于仪器维护或信号问题导致的数据缺口对黑河流域生态和气候趋势的长期监测可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Data gaps due to instrument maintenance or signal issues can lead to incomplete datasets, which may hinder the continuous monitoring and accurate assessment of ecological and climatic trends in the Heihe River Basin, potentially affecting the ability to draw long-term conclusions about changes in energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in the region.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 由于仪器维护或信号问题导致的数据缺口可能导致数据集不完整，这可能妨碍对黑河流域生态和气候趋势的持续监测和准确评估，从而影响对该地区能量、水汽和碳通量变化的长期结论的得出。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the key objectives behind collecting and processing long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集和处理绿洲-沙漠生态系统中长期能源、水汽和碳交换数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The key objectives include achieving a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert areas, recognizing oasis-desert interactions, and supporting the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases. Furthermore, it aims to help achieve carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals and ensure sustainable oasis development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标包括实现对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用，并支持绿洲的生态稳定和社会经济发展。此外，还旨在帮助实现碳达峰和碳中和目标，确保绿洲的可持续发展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to implement quality control procedures when processing observational datasets from oasis-desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在处理来自绿洲-沙漠系统的观察性数据集时，实施质量控制程序的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Quality control procedures are crucial to ensure the accuracy and reliability of observational datasets, which are used to understand the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems. This understanding is vital for maintaining ecological stability, supporting socioeconomic development, and achieving sustainable oasis development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 质量控制程序对于确保观测数据集的准确性和可靠性至关重要，这些数据集用于了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的基本特征。这种理解对于维持生态稳定、支持社会经济发展以及实现可持续的绿洲发展至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the rationale behind establishing multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations in the middle and lower reaches of river basins in arid regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区的河流中下游建立多个陆面通量和气象站的理由是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The rationale is to obtain detailed observational data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert areas, which are crucial for understanding oasis-desert interactions, supporting ecological stability, and promoting sustainable development in arid regions. These stations provide essential data to study the impact of arid conditions on ecological and agricultural productivity.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 该研究的 rationale 是获取关于绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的详细观测数据，这对于理解绿洲-沙漠相互作用、支持生态稳定以及促进干旱地区的可持续发展至关重要。这些站点提供的基本数据有助于研究干旱条件对生态和农业生产力的影响。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to ensure data quality and accuracy when observing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在观察绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换时，确保数据质量和准确性所使用的程序有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data quality and accuracy are ensured through several steps, including the removal of saturated Cn2 data, excluding data with weak demodulation signal intensity, discarding data during precipitation, and eliminating weak turbulence data under stable conditions. The processing involves iterative calculations based on Monin-Obukhov similarity theory and the use of specific stability universal functions for different instruments.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据质量和准确性通过几个步骤得以确保，包括去除饱和的Cn2数据、排除信号强度较弱的解调数据、丢弃降水期间的数据，以及在稳定条件下消除弱湍流数据。处理过程涉及基于Monin-Obukhov相似理论的迭代计算，以及针对不同仪器使用特定的稳定性普适函数。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What challenges are involved in maintaining continuous data collection in arid and semiarid regions, and how are these addressed?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，持续数据收集面临哪些挑战，以及如何应对这些挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Challenges in maintaining continuous data collection include equipment maintenance issues, power shortages, and signal problems, which can lead to data gaps. These are addressed by supplementing missing data from alternative sources (e.g., using RR-RSS460 data when BLS900 data is missing) and marking unavailable data with placeholders like '-6999'.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 持续数据收集面临的挑战包括设备维护问题、供电短缺和信号问题，这些都可能导致数据缺失。为了解决这些问题，可以通过替代来源补充缺失的数据（例如，当BLS900数据缺失时使用RR-RSS460数据），并用占位符如'-6999'标记不可用的数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements in scintillometer models enable the accurate measurement of sensible heat fluxes in arid and semi-arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些闪烁仪模型的技术进步使得在干旱和半干旱地区准确测量显热通量成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: In the Heihe River Basin, the deployment of advanced scintillometer models such as BLS900 and RR-RSS460 has enabled accurate measurements of sensible heat fluxes. These devices, with their specific configurations and iterative calculations based on Monin-Obukhov similarity theory, provide robust data even in challenging arid environments.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在黑河流域，先进的闪烁仪模型如BLS900和RR-RSS460的部署使得感热通量的准确测量成为可能。这些设备凭借其特定的配置和基于Monin-Obukhov相似理论的迭代计算，即使在具有挑战性的干旱环境中也能提供可靠的数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do data processing and quality control procedures enable the reliability of flux measurements in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序如何提高绿洲-沙漠生态系统中通量测量的可靠性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control procedures enhance reliability by removing saturated data, weak signal data, and data recorded during precipitation or under weak turbulence. These steps ensure that the resulting dataset is accurate and representative of the actual environmental conditions in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序通过去除饱和数据、弱信号数据以及在降水或弱湍流下记录的数据来增强可靠性。这些步骤确保最终的数据集准确且代表绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的实际环境条件。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions must be met to effectively use large aperture scintillometers for long-term environmental monitoring in oasis–desert systems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 有效使用大孔径闪烁仪进行绿洲-沙漠系统的长期环境监测必须满足哪些条件？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Effective use of large aperture scintillometers requires stable power supply, proper maintenance, and signal integrity. The instruments should be installed at appropriate heights and distances, with rigorous data quality control to manage data gaps due to instrument maintenance or power issues, as seen with the Heihe River Basin's network.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 有效使用大孔径闪烁仪需要稳定的电源、适当的维护和信号完整性。仪器应安装在适当的高度和距离，并进行严格的数据质量控制，以管理因仪器维护或电源问题导致的数据缺口，正如在黑河流域网络中所见。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be gaps or missing data in datasets collected using large aperture scintillometers in arid regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区使用大孔径闪烁仪收集的数据集中，可能会出现数据缺口或缺失数据的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The gaps or missing data in datasets collected using large aperture scintillometers in arid regions may be due to equipment maintenance, insufficient power supply, or signal issues. Additionally, specific dates are noted where data was missing, possibly due to these challenges.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区使用大孔径闪烁仪收集的数据集中，缺失数据或空缺可能是由于设备维护、电源不足或信号问题。此外，特定日期的数据缺失可能与这些挑战有关。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected challenges in maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems using observational datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在使用观测数据集维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡时，预期会面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Expected challenges in maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems using observational datasets include ecological degradation issues like drying rivers and lakes, vegetation degradation, intensifying desertification, and frequent dust storms in inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在利用观测数据集维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡时，预期面临的挑战包括生态退化问题，如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化、沙漠化加剧以及干旱和半干旱地区内陆河流流域频繁发生的沙尘暴。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is the integration of both artificial and natural oasis–desert system data crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么整合人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统数据对于理解这些生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换至关重要？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The integration of both artificial and natural oasis–desert system data is crucial to provide a comprehensive quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, which is significant for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and supporting ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统数据的整合对于提供能量、水汽和碳交换的全面定量理解至关重要，这对认识绿洲–沙漠相互作用以及支持生态稳定和社会经济发展具有重要意义。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective are the data quality control measures, such as removing saturated Cn2 values and weak demodulation signal intensities, in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of data collected with large aperture scintillometers?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 数据质量控制措施，如去除饱和的Cn2值和弱解调信号强度，对于确保使用大孔径闪烁仪收集的数据的准确性和可靠性，效果如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The data quality control measures are designed to ensure high accuracy and reliability by removing data that may be compromised due to saturation, weak signals, precipitation, or weak turbulence. These steps help refine the dataset to reflect more accurate environmental conditions, essential for research on energy and water vapor exchange in arid and semi-arid regions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据质量控制措施旨在通过去除因饱和、信号弱、降水或弱湍流而可能受到影响的数据，确保高准确性和可靠性。这些步骤有助于精炼数据集，以更准确地反映环境条件，这对于研究干旱和半干旱地区的能量和水蒸气交换至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways might the integration of additional data sources, such as remote sensing or other hydrometeorological data, enhance the understanding of oasis-desert interactions and improve dataset robustness?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 整合额外的数据源，例如遥感或其他水文气象数据，可能会通过哪些方式增强对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的理解并提高数据集的稳健性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating additional data sources like remote sensing or hydrometeorological data could provide a more comprehensive perspective on oasis-desert interactions. It would enhance dataset robustness by offering supplementary insights into spatial variability and temporal dynamics, supporting a deeper understanding of energy, water, and carbon exchanges.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 整合额外的数据源，如遥感或水文气象数据，可以为绿洲与沙漠的相互作用提供更全面的视角。通过提供对空间变异性和时间动态的补充见解，这将增强数据集的稳健性，支持对能量、水和碳交换的更深入理解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the data collection methods ensure accurate energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange measurements in such varied ecological landscapes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据收集方法如何确保在如此多样的生态景观中准确测量能量、水蒸气和碳交换。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data collection methods involve using a combination of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers to measure half-hourly turbulent flux data. Additionally, automatic weather stations provide hydrometeorological data, which include gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, and other necessary parameters for precise measurements.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法涉及使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪的组合，以测量半小时的湍流通量数据。此外，自动气象站提供水文气象数据，包括气温和湿度的梯度、风速和风向以及其他必要的参数，以便进行精确测量。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges faced when collecting data in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域收集数据时面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The challenges include ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent occurrence of dust storms, which can affect data collection and accuracy.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生态环境退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁发生的沙尘暴，这些都可能影响数据收集和准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how a dataset can integrate various parameters like hydrometeorological data, vegetation, and soil characteristics effectively.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解一个数据集如何有效地整合各种参数，如水文气象数据、植被和土壤特征。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The integration is achieved by establishing a network of land surface flux and meteorological stations that provide comprehensive datasets. These include energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, along with auxiliary data such as soil and vegetation parameters, which are systematically collected, processed, and archived for accessibility and analysis.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 通过建立一个陆地表面通量和气象站网络，实现了集成。这些站点提供了全面的数据集，包括能量、水蒸气和碳通量，以及土壤和植被参数等辅助数据，这些数据被系统地收集、处理和存档，以便于访问和分析。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the data collection methods used for capturing energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in oasis–desert ecosystems in arid and semi-arid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述用于捕捉干旱和半干旱地区绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳通量的数据收集方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection methods for capturing energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in oasis–desert ecosystems involve using an eddy covariance system and a scintillometer for half-hourly turbulent flux data acquisition. Additionally, automatic weather stations provide hydrometeorological data with a 10-minute average period, including radiation, soil heat flux, profiles of soil temperature, gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed, wind direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，捕获能量、水蒸气和碳通量的数据收集方法包括使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪进行半小时的湍流通量数据采集。此外，自动气象站提供10分钟平均周期的水文气象数据，包括辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速、风向、气压、降水量和土壤湿度剖面。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced in maintaining ecological stability in arid inland river basins, and how these are addressed through data collection and monitoring.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在干旱内陆河流流域维持生态稳定所面临的挑战，以及如何通过数据收集和监测来应对这些挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in maintaining ecological stability in arid inland river basins include ecological environment degradation, such as drying rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These are addressed through long-term observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems, which monitor energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, as well as hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters, thereby supporting sustainable oasis development and ecological security.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 维持干旱内陆河流盆地生态稳定的挑战包括生态环境退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些问题通过来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集来解决，这些数据集监测能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量，以及水文气象、植被和土壤参数，从而支持可持续的绿洲发展和生态安全。
